title: North Carolina amusement park closes ride after discovering crack in support beam
description: The park calls it the “tallest, fastest, longest giga coaster in North America."

title: Children face solitary confinement in cells at Illinois juvenile detention facility, ACLU says
description: Young people are confined to cells the size of parking spaces, group says.

title: Feds call off pesticide spraying near New Mexico’s Rio Chama to kill invasive grasshoppers
description: Federal land managers had planned to spray near the Rio Chama in New Mexico,

title: Climate activists disrupt London Pride march to protest corporate sponsorship
description: They briefly halted the dance-filled march, blocking a Coca-Cola-sponsored float

title: Russian media watchdog blacklists outlets linked to Wagner mercenary chief
description: The Russian media watchdog has blacklisted at least five media outlets.

title: WATCH:  Grandparents sprint on horse racetrack
description: These grandparents put their sprinting skills to test in a 40-meter dash on a horse racing track in Washington.

title: North Carolina 12-week abortion ban goes into effect, down from 20-week limit
description: Abortions are now prohibited in North Carolina after 12-weeks after a new ban goes into effect.

title: European telescope launched to hunt for clues to universe's darkest secrets
description: A European space telescope has blasted off to explore the mysterious and invisible realm known as the dark universe

title: Moms for Liberty are fired up in Philadelphia
description: Moms for Liberty gather in Philadelphia to discuss hot-button cultural issues.

title: Canadian wildfires should prompt more proactive mitigation from government: Experts
description: Environmental experts say that the Candian and U.S. governments need to take a more proactive approach at combating the root causes of growing wildfires.

title: Hungry ticks can use this static trick to land on you and your pets
description: Static electricity might help ticks zoom through the air to grab onto people and animals

title: Pakistani security forces kill 6 militants in separate raids near the border with Afghanistan
description: Pakistan’s military says security forces have raided two militant hideouts in regions near the border with Afghanistan

title: As if air travel isn't hard enough, 5G wireless signals could disrupt flights starting this weekend
description: Airline passengers dealing with weather delays could face a new source of disruptions this weekend

title: 25 dead after bus crashes and catches fire in western India
description: Police in western India say a tire blowout caused a bus to lose control and crash into a road divider and burst into flames, killing 25 people

title: Hollywood unions extend contract negotiations for actors
description: The current SAG-AFTRA was set to expired Friday at midnight.
